CustomField.formula: IF( Software_License_Term__c = "Monthly", (UnitPrice*12*Quantity), IF(Software_License_Term__c = "Annual", (UnitPrice*Quantity), IF (Product_Type__c ="Services" || Product_Type__c ="Services Discount" || Product_Type__c ="Support", Total_Price_Book_Amount__c, NULL )))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Total Price x12 only for Opportunity Product.Software License Type = Monthly
CustomField.label: Total Price (Annual)
